mapper.select: select store.store_no, store.name, store.address_short, store.thumbnail, store.star_rate, store.review_num, advertisement_store.advertise_payback, (6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{y})) * cos(radians(address_y)) * cos(radians(address_x) - radians(#{x})) + sin(radians(#{y})) * sin(radians(address_y)))) AS dist from store, advertisement_store WHERE (6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{y})) * cos(radians(address_y)) * cos(radians(address_x) - radians(#{x})) + sin(radians(#{y})) * sin(radians(address_y)))) <= 100 AND advertisement_store.store_no = store.store_no AND advertisement_store.status = true AND store.class_first = #{class_first} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 8
select IF(EXISTS(select * from advertisement_store WHERE store_no = #{store_no}), advertisement_store.advertise_payback, store.payback_rate) from advertisement_store, store

SET @StarRate = (select star_rate from store WHERE store_no = #{last_index}); SET @PayBackRate = (select advertise_payback from advertisement_store WHERE store_no = #{last_index} AND status = true); SET @ReviewNum = (select review_num from store WHERE store_no = #{last_index});
select store.store_no, store.name, store.address_short, store.thumbnail, store.star_rate, store.review_num, advertisement_store.advertise_payback, (6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{y})) * cos(radians(address_y)) * cos(radians(address_x) - radians(#{x})) + sin(radians(#{y})) * sin(radians(address_y)))) AS dist from store, advertisement_store WHERE (6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{y})) * cos(radians(address_y)) * cos(radians(address_x) - radians(#{x})) + sin(radians(#{y})) * sin(radians(address_y)))) <= 100 AND advertisement_store.store_no = store.store_no AND advertisement_store.status = true AND store.class_first = #{class_first}
AND (star_rate < @StarRate OR (star_rate = @StarRate AND store.store_no < #{last_index})
AND (advertisement_store.advertise_payback < @PayBackRate OR (advertisement_store.advertise_payback = @PayBackRate AND store.store_no < #{last_index})
AND (store.review_num < @ReviewNum OR (store.review_num = @ReviewNum AND store.store_no < #{last_index})
ORDER BY star_rate DESC, store.store_no DESC
ORDER BY advertisement_store.advertise_payback DESC, store.store_no DESC
ORDER BY store.review_num DESC, store.store_no DESC
LIMIT 10
